indicator.description: 1. Number of people benefiting from strengthened livelihoods, disaggregated by gender 2. Number of community rehabilitation projects carried out in the affected area to restore socio-economic infrastructure ( targeting women & youth) 3. Data collected for use in development planning.

baseline.comment: 1. Limited income generating activities for men, women and youth affected by conflict. 2. Community infrastructure destroyed in conflict affected state 3. Absence of compiled data on crisis that is useful for development planning.

target.comment: 1. 250 (125 men, 125 women) 3. 1 community infrastructure rehabilitated/constructed 3. Crisis mapped and government supported with analytical capacity

actual.comment: 1. 351 (139 Women) 2. Construction of Mingkaman Market Shed is 60% finished and the contractor secured major construction materials and manpower at the site. 3. An independent assessment of the Crisis Risk Mapping Analysis (CRMA) Phase I was conducted

target.comment: 1. 500 (50% women) 2. Maintenance and continued use of community infrastructure 4. One county strategic plan produced

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: 1. Number of new smear positive TB patients notified to the national health authority 2. Number of all TB patients (including new smear positive, new smear negative, extrapulmonary, retreatment and relapse) notified to the national health authority 3. Number of TB cases that receive Drug Susceptibility Testing among TB cases suspected of MDR TB 5. Number of laboratories showing adequate performance in external quality assurance for smear microscopy among the total number of laboratories that undertake EQA during the reporting period 6. Number and Percentage of TB patients with known HIV status 7. Number and Percentage of TB/HIV co-infected patients initiated on CPT among the total number of TB/HIV patients registered 8. Number and Percentage of HIV-positive registered TB patients given antiretroviral therapy during TB treatment

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description:
1. Endorsement and adoption of legislations, policies and other strategic documents related to SALW control.
2. Ratification of international treaties, conventions and protocols on Small Arms and Light Weapons control

baseline.comment:
1. No framework, legislation of national policy exists to guide small/arms and light weapons control strategy.
2. Lack of international treaties, conventions and protocols

target.comment:
1. National legal framework SALW endorsed, regulating the illegal possession and use of small arms.
2. International treaties, conventions and protocols signed and ratified

actual.comment:
1. The SALW bill is now reviewed by the Cluster Committee of the Council of Ministers awaiting presentation in Parliament.
2. SALW treaties, conventions and protocols relevant to South Sudan have been mapped and prioritized. Ratification is expected in 2015 depending on the peace talks.

target.comment: 1. SALW Bill is passed. 3. Five international legal instruments on SALW control reviewed and presented to the MoI and MoFA for ratification

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: 1. Common space for dialogue between conflicting communities established 2. A national infrastructure capable of leading South Sudan's peace and reconciliation agenda established

baseline.comment: 1. No space for dialogue 2. No infrastructure for peace

target.comment: 1. National Platform for Peace and Reconciliation (NPPR) is established and has endorsed a one year national work plan 2. Consultations commence on establishing a national framework on South Sudan's Infrastructure for Peace

actual.comment: 1.The NPPR was established and implementation 2014 work plan. 2. Consultations began on the establishment of an infrastructure for peace. Consultations will continue in 2015

target.comment: 1. 12 actions are undertaken to support the establishment of a common forum for dialogue across conflicting communities 2. A technical strategy/concept note that articulates the design and modality of South Sudan’s “Infrastructure for Peace” is drafted in consultation with key stakeholders.

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: 1. Number of institutional policies developed to enhance operations (by institution and type of policy). 2. Number of strategic plans/frameworks developed to implement established policies. 3. Proportion of targeted institutions reporting improved work-related performance by the twins 4. Proportion of twins expressing satisfaction over the twinning arrangements.

baseline.comment: 1. Cabinet Memos prepared for submission of 2 policy documents to the Council of Ministers: Government Records Management Policy and The Civil Service Training Policy. 2. 3 strategic plans approved and 1 framework (South Sudan Pensions Fund By-laws). 3. 80% of the supervisors reported improved skills of twins . 4. 95% of twins gained knowledge from their coach/mentor

actual.comment: 1. 1 2. 3 3. 88% of trainees indicated that service delivery in their institutions improved 5. 80% .
